category: Herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clears Heat and detoxifies, strengthens the Heart and promotes urination

indications: Painful, swollen throat, sores and boils, edema, abdominal distension, hematemesis, snake and insect bites, cardiac failure, metrorrhagia and metrostaxis, diphtheritis

contraindications: Do not use for a long time.
Reduce dosage if there is nausea, dizziness, chest fullness and congestion, diarrhea, cold extremities
